TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstallContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含关于当前安装的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the current installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，可执行安装程序集的可执行文件（如 Installutil.exe）创建 。Typically, an is created by an installation executable, such as InstallUtil.exe, that installs assemblies. 安装程序调用 构造函数，并向其传递默认的日志文件路径和命令行参数。The installation program invokes the constructor, passing it the default log-file path and command-line parameters. 在调用其 、、或 方法之前，安装程序会将 的 属性设置为 的实例。Prior to calling its , , , or methods, the installation program sets the property of an to the instance of . 在调用这些方法之前，包含 属性中的安装程序集合的 将设置每个包含的安装程序的 属性。Before calling these methods, an that contains an installer collection in the property sets the property of each contained installer. 属性包含为运行安装可执行文件而输入的命令行的分析版本。The property contains a parsed version of the command line that is entered to run the installation executable. 属性包含诸如日志文件的路径、是否在控制台上显示日志信息的信息，以及是否在安装过程中显示用户界面。The property contains information such as the path to a log file, whether to display log information on the console, and whether to show a user interface during the installation. 调用 方法，查明是否 `true`了命令行参数。Call the method to find out whether a command-line parameter is `true`. 使用 方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。Use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 构造函数、 属性以及 类的 和 方法。The following example demonstrates the constructors, the property and the and methods of the class. 当调用安装程序的 方法时，它会检查命令行中的参数。When the method of the installer is called, it checks for parameters from the command line. 根据这种情况，它会在控制台上显示进度消息，并将其保存到指定的日志文件。Depending on that, it displays the progress messages onto the console and also saves it to the specified log file. 如果在没有任何参数的情况下调用程序，则将创建一个空 。When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty is created. 指定 "/LogFile" 和 "/LogtoConsole" 时，通过将各自的参数传递给 来创建 。When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the is created by passing the respective arguments to . [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载不会创建用于安装的日志文件。This overload does not create a log file for the installation. ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 构造函数的重载版本之一。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the constructor. 有关可能可用的其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. 如果在没有任何参数的情况下调用程序，则将创建一个空 。When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty is created. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#2)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string logFilePath, string[] commandLine) cil managed
Public Sub New (logFilePath As String, commandLine As String())

param.name: logFilePath
param.span: 此安装的日志文件的路径，或者如果无须创建日志文件，则为 。

span.span: The path to the log file for this installation, or if no log file should be created.

param.name: commandLine
param.span: 运行安装程序时输入的命令行参数，或者如果未输入任何内容，则为 。

span.span: The command-line parameters entered when running the installation program, or if none were entered.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并创建安装的日志文件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, and creates a log file for the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果安装使用[installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](/dotnet/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool)，此构造函数将在指定的路径创建一个日志文件，并将命令行参数的数组分析到 属性中。If the installation uses [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool), this constructor creates a log file at the specified path and parses the array of command-line parameters into the property. 如果在命令行参数中指定了日志文件路径，则将使用该路径来创建文件。If a log-file path is specified in the command-line parameters, it is used to create the file. 如果未在命令行中指定日志文件参数，将使用 `logFilePath` 参数的值。If the log file argument is not specified in the command line, the value of the `logFilePath` parameter is used. 若要禁止创建日志文件，请传递 "/logfile =" 命令行参数。To suppress the creation of a log file, pass the "/logfile= " command-line parameter. ## Examples 此示例摘自 类的类概述中的示例。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 指定 "/LogFile" 和 "/LogtoConsole" 时，通过将各自的参数传递给 来创建 。When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the is created by passing the respective arguments to . [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#3)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#3)]

para.span: 调用此构造函数时，在 参数中传递默认的日志文件路径。

span.span: Pass your default log-file path in the parameter when you call this constructor.

para.span: 这是创建日志文件的位置，除非在运行安装可执行文件时使用了/logfile 命令行参数。

span.span: This is the where the log file is created, unless the /logfile command-line parameter is used when the installation executable is run.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsParameterTrue(string paramName) cil managed
Public Function IsParameterTrue (paramName As String) As Boolean

param.span: 要检查的命令行参数的名称。

span.span: The name of the command-line parameter to check.

summary.span: 确定指定的命令行参数是否为 。

span.span: Determines whether the specified command-line parameter is .

returns.span: 如果指定的参数设置为“是”、“真”、“1”或空字符串 ("")，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified parameter is set to "yes", "true", "1", or an empty string (""); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法访问包含分析版本的命令行参数的 属性，以确定是否 `true`指定的参数。This method accesses the property, which contains a parsed version of the command-line parameters, to determine whether the specified parameter is `true`. ## Examples 此示例摘自 类的类概述中的示例。This example is an excerpt of the sample in the class overview of the class. 它使用 方法来确定是否已设置了 `LogtoConsole` 参数。It uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果 `yes`，它将使用 方法将状态消息写入安装日志文件和控制台。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#4)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LogMessage(string message) cil managed

summary.span: 将消息写入控制台和安装的日志文件。

span.span: Writes a message to the console and to the log file for the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装程序可以调用此方法将进度或其他状态信息写入日志文件。An installer can call this method to write progress or other status information to the log file. 如果命令行参数指定应显示用户界面，则除了调用 方法外，安装程序还应显示消息框或进行查询。If the command-line parameters specify that a user interface should be displayed, the installer should show message boxes or make queries in addition to calling the method. 除非使用 Installutil.exe 来运行安装并在命令行中指定了 "/LogToConsole = true"，否则用户将不会查看写入到日志文件的文本。Text written to the log file will not be seen by the user unless InstallUtil.exe is used to run the installation and "/LogToConsole= true" is specified in the command line. ## Examples 此示例摘自 类的类概述中的示例。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 它使用 方法来确定是否已设置了 `LogtoConsole` 参数。It uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果 `yes`，它将使用 方法将状态消息写入安装日志文件和控制台。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#4)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As StringDictionary

summary.span: 获取在运行 InstallUtil.exe 时输入的命令行参数。

span.span: Gets the command-line parameters that were entered when InstallUtil.exe was run.

value.span: 一个 ，它代表运行可执行安装文件时输入的命令行参数。

span.span: A that represents the command-line parameters that were entered when the installation executable was run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的 时，命令行参数将分析到 属性中。When a new is created, the command-line parameters are parsed into the property. 参数的键和值都是字符串。Both the keys and the values of the parameters are strings. ## Examples 此示例摘自 类的类概述中的示例。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 该示例检索 属性，以查看用户是否输入了任何命令行参数。The sample retrieves the property to see if any command line argument has been entered by the user. 它还使用 方法来找出是否已设置了 `LogtoConsole` 参数。It also uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果 `yes`，它将使用 方法将状态消息写入安装日志文件和控制台。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#6)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#6)]
